item.title: Portfolio
item.description: This is Web page of Naoya Furudono, who is master course sutendent of Tokyo Institute of Technology (Graduate Major in Mathematical and Computing Science). He majors in theory and implementation design of programming language. Links GitHub: naoyafurudono Twitter: (@furudono2) (not active, but live) Development Todo App Aim to show my code Academic Paper 2022 “Towards Efficient Adjustment of Effect Rows” in TFP2022 Paper (submitted version, pdf) Slide (pdf) Talk at TFP2022 (12min, mp4) Talks 2022 Permissions in Linux slide (google slides) Survey of hygienic macros slide (pdf) 2021 Progress about Open Floating slide (pdf) Survey the design and implementation of Julia slide (pdf) 2020 Mini-talk about my favorite beer slide (pdf)
